info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 25 at 1:39PM CDT until May 28 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri...
Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County.
Sac River near Caplinger Mills affecting Cedar County.
For the Little Osage River...including Horton...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Sac River...including Caplinger Mills...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Sac River near Caplinger Mills.
* WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, moderate Flood Stage. Flood waters reach approximately three feet in depth at the Caplinger Mills Campground.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 PM CDT Sunday was 16.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 16.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 18.1 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.1 feet on 05/04/2013. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Monday afternoon at 145 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
